line_1: The whole stands still, or breaks to pieces;
line_2: But if the Horal Orbite ceases;

line_1: Shun this rude Sport, or gad you'll shake to pieces;
line_2: Therefore all you that carry tender Fleeces,

line_1: And Boileau, for eight hundred Pieces,
line_2: When once the Poet's Honour ceases,
Of mothers, daughters, aunts and neices,
